title: Verify: Add Backend Unit and Integration Tests
description:
Run automated tests for task T-072.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Write pytest (with pytest-asyncio) unit tests for all new applets, orchestrator engine, API endpoints, and auth flow. Add integration tests for full workflow execution. Target 80%+ coverage.
Criteria:
- Unit tests for all backend modules
- Integration tests for workflows
- Test coverage >= 80%
- All tests pass
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests for all backend modules
